policies.name: authenticate-basic
policies.description: Authenticate with a backend service using Basic authentication

policies.name: authenticate-certificate
policies.description: Authenticate with a backend service using a client certificate

thumbprint.label: Certificate Thumbprint
thumbprint.description: Thumbprint of the certificate stored in API Management

certificateId.label: Certificate ID
certificateId.description: ID of the certificate (alternative to thumbprint)

policies.name: authenticate-managed-identity
policies.description: Authenticate with a backend service using a managed identity

policies.name: rate-limit
policies.description: Prevents API usage spikes by limiting the call rate per subscription

calls.label: Calls
calls.description: Maximum number of calls allowed during the time period

renewal-period.label: Renewal Period (seconds)
renewal-period.description: Time window in seconds for rate limit

counter-key.label: Counter Key
counter-key.description: Expression to use as rate limit key (default: subscription key)

policies.name: rate-limit-by-key
policies.description: Prevents API usage spikes by limiting the call rate per key

counter-key.label: Counter Key Expression
counter-key.description: Expression to use as rate limit key

policies.name: quota
policies.description: Enforces a renewable or lifetime call volume and/or bandwidth quota per subscription

renewal-period.label: Renewal Period (seconds)
renewal-period.description: Time window for quota renewal (0 for lifetime quota)

policies.name: set-header
policies.description: Assigns a value to an existing response and/or request header or adds a new response and/or request header

name.label: Header Name
name.description: Name of the header to set

value.label: Header Value
value.description: Value to set for the header (can be expression)

exists-action.label: Exists Action
exists-action.description: Action when header exists: override, skip, append

policies.name: set-body
policies.description: Sets the message body for incoming and outgoing requests

body.label: Body Content
body.description: Body content (can be expression or template)

mode.label: Mode
mode.description: How to set body: raw, template, liquid

policies.name: find-and-replace
policies.description: Finds a request or response substring and replaces it with another substring

from.label: Find
from.description: String or regex pattern to find

policies.name: json-to-xml
policies.description: Converts request or response body from JSON to XML

policies.name: xml-to-json
policies.description: Converts request or response body from XML to JSON

policies.name: cache-lookup
policies.description: Perform cache lookup and return a valid cached response when available

downstream-caching-type.label: Downstream Caching Type
downstream-caching-type.description: Type of downstream caching: none, private, public

policies.name: cache-store
policies.description: Cache response according to the specified cache settings

policies.name: forward-request
policies.description: Forwards the incoming request to the backend service

follow-redirects.label: Follow Redirects
follow-redirects.description: How to handle redirects: none, false, true

policies.name: set-backend-service
policies.description: Changes the backend service for an incoming request

policies.name: rewrite-uri
policies.description: Converts a request URL from its public form to the form expected by the web service

copy-unmatched-params.label: Copy Unmatched Params
copy-unmatched-params.description: Copy query parameters not in template

policies.name: validate-jwt
policies.description: Enforces existence and validity of a JWT extracted from either a specified HTTP header or a specified query parameter

policies.name: check-header
policies.description: Enforces that a request has a specified HTTP header and/or that it has a specified value

name.label: Header Name
name.description: Name of the HTTP header to check

failed-check-httpcode.label: Failed Check HTTP Code
failed-check-httpcode.description: HTTP status code to return if check fails

failed-check-error-message.label: Failed Check Error Message
failed-check-error-message.description: Error message to return if check fails

policies.name: cors
policies.description: Adds cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) support to an operation or an API

policies.name: trace
policies.description: Adds a custom trace into the API Inspector output, Application Insights telemetries, and/or Diagnostic Logs

policies.name: log-to-eventhub
policies.description: Sends messages in the specified format to an Event Hub defined by a Logger entity

logger-id.label: Logger ID
logger-id.description: ID of the Event Hub logger

partition-key.label: Partition Key
partition-key.description: Partition key for Event Hub (can be expression)

policies.name: emit-metric
policies.description: Emits a custom metric to Application Insights

policies.name: retry
policies.description: Retries execution of the enclosed policy statements, if and until the condition is met

interval.label: Interval (seconds)
interval.description: Wait interval between retries in seconds

policies.name: circuit-breaker
policies.description: Prevents an API from being overwhelmed when part of the backend is experiencing issues

failure-threshold.label: Failure Threshold
failure-threshold.description: Number of failures before opening circuit

half-open-after.label: Half Open After (seconds)
half-open-after.description: Time in seconds before attempting half-open

policies.name: return-response
policies.description: Aborts pipeline execution and returns either a default or custom response to the caller

policies.name: llm-token-limit
policies.description: Limits the number of tokens that can be sent to an LLM backend per time period. Supports multiple time windows (minute, hour, day, week, month, year) and pre-calculation of prompt tokens.

tokens-per-week.label: Tokens Per Week
tokens-per-week.description: Maximum tokens allowed per week (Premium v2 only)

tokens-per-month.label: Tokens Per Month
tokens-per-month.description: Maximum tokens allowed per month (Premium v2 only)

counter-key.label: Counter Key
counter-key.description: Expression to use as rate limit key (default: subscription key). Examples: @(context.Request.IpAddress), @(context.User.Id)

estimate-prompt-tokens.label: Estimate Prompt Tokens
estimate-prompt-tokens.description: Pre-calculate prompt tokens before sending to backend

remaining-tokens-variable-name.label: Remaining Tokens Variable
remaining-tokens-variable-name.description: Variable name to store remaining tokens after limit check

notes.PremiumV2: Full support: all time windows, per-consumer limits, pre-calculation

policies.name: llm-content-safety
policies.description: Validates content using Azure AI Content Safety before sending to LLM backend. Supports prompt moderation, response filtering, and content classification.

content-safety-resource-id.label: Content Safety Resource ID
content-safety-resource-id.description: Resource ID of Azure AI Content Safety resource. Format: /subscriptions/{sub-id}/resourceGroups/{rg}/providers/Microsoft.CognitiveServices/accounts/{account-name}

on-violation.label: On Violation Action
on-violation.description: Action to take when content safety violation detected

notes.PremiumV2: Full support: prompt/response moderation, content classification, custom actions

policies.name: llm-semantic-cache-lookup
policies.description: Looks up semantically similar requests in cache using vector embeddings. Requires Azure Cache for Redis with RediSearch module.

cache-provider-id.label: Cache Provider ID
cache-provider-id.description: ID of the cache provider. Can be Redis connection string or named value reference

similarity-threshold.label: Similarity Threshold
similarity-threshold.description: Similarity threshold (0.0 to 1.0). Higher values require more exact matches

embeddings-api.label: Embeddings API
embeddings-api.description: API endpoint for generating embeddings (default: Azure OpenAI embeddings)

cache-key-prefix.label: Cache Key Prefix
cache-key-prefix.description: Prefix for cache keys to namespace different APIs

requirements: Azure Cache for Redis with RediSearch module

notes.PremiumV2: Full support: custom embeddings API, cache invalidation
notes.StandardV2: Basic support: Azure OpenAI embeddings only
notes.BasicV2: Basic support: Azure OpenAI embeddings only

policies.name: llm-semantic-cache-store
policies.description: Stores LLM request/response in semantic cache with vector embeddings for similarity matching. Must be used with llm-semantic-cache-lookup.

cache-provider-id.label: Cache Provider ID
cache-provider-id.description: ID of the cache provider. Must match the provider used in llm-semantic-cache-lookup

ttl.label: Time To Live (seconds)
ttl.description: Cache entry expiration time in seconds

embeddings-api.label: Embeddings API
embeddings-api.description: API endpoint for generating embeddings (must match lookup policy)

cache-key-prefix.label: Cache Key Prefix
cache-key-prefix.description: Prefix for cache keys (must match lookup policy)

requirements: Azure Cache for Redis with RediSearch module

notes.PremiumV2: Full support: custom TTL, cache invalidation

policies.name: llm-emit-token-metric
policies.description: Emits token usage metrics to Application Insights

policies.name: azure-openai-emit-token-metric
policies.description: Emits Azure OpenAI specific token usage metrics to Application Insights

namespace.label: Namespace
namespace.description: Metric namespace for Azure OpenAI metrics

dimensions.label: Custom Dimensions
dimensions.description: Additional dimensions to include in metrics

policies.name: azure-openai-token-limit
policies.description: Limits tokens for Azure OpenAI endpoints with enhanced Azure OpenAI specific features

counter-key.label: Counter Key
counter-key.description: Expression to use as rate limit key (default: subscription key)

policies.name: llm-backend-pool
policies.description: Configures backend pool for LLM load balancing with session-aware routing and PTU optimization

backend-pool-id.label: Backend Pool ID
backend-pool-id.description: ID of the backend pool configured in APIM

session-key.label: Session Key
session-key.description: Expression to use as session key for session-aware routing

policies.name: get-authorization-context
policies.description: Retrieves OAuth authorization context for backend authentication

authorization-provider-id.label: Authorization Provider ID
authorization-provider-id.description: ID of the OAuth authorization provider

context-variable-name.label: Context Variable Name
context-variable-name.description: Variable name to store authorization context

policies.name: validate-content
policies.description: Validates request/response content structure and format for LLM APIs

schema.label: JSON Schema
schema.description: JSON schema for validation (as string or reference)

on-error.label: On Error Action
on-error.description: Action to take on validation error

policies.name: choose
policies.description: Conditionally applies policy statements based on the evaluation of Boolean expressions

policies.name: include
policies.description: Includes policy statements from a specified policy

fragment-id.label: Fragment ID
fragment-id.description: ID of the policy fragment to include

policies.name: send-request
policies.description: Sends a request to the specified URL

policies.name: wait
policies.description: Waits for enclosed send-request policies to complete before proceeding
